name: Lovers Point Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We pitched up in Monterey on a Saturday afternoon looking for a hotel and ended up outside the Pacific Grove chamber of commerce. This was shut but there were accommodation availability sheets outside in a box as well as a couple of maps, so we headed for the Lovers Point Inn.
reviews.title: Good for the price

likes.disliked: — Parking in front of the hotel is in a one-way street.

reviews.text: As other reviews have said, the building is a bit dated and could do with a bit of work. I'd hate to be in the rooms next to the elevator & vending machines, but our room was upstairs at the far end from reception. The room was OK - bed was comfortable enough, coffee machine worked - and wasn't particularly expensive, especially given that it was a Saturday night on the coast. Heating was a bit strange - the room had an electric heater controlled by a wall thermostat so you can just dial in the temperature you want, but a modern air conditioning unit would be much better.
reviews.title: Not great but not terrible
Great Location, Good Value
reviews.text: Location is good - you can walk to Monterey Aquarium along the shore path and see the seals in the fenced-off section, and you can hire bikes from nearby. Very close to the beach.

reviews.title: Not the greatest
reviews.text: The hotel is outdated but clean. Our bed was quite hard (and I like firm beds!) and our bottom floor room was kind of noisy with people coming and going. Being very close to the ocean is nice. We got a decent rate but you can do better in the area if you shop around.

description: The Lover's Point Inn is located on the coast of historic Pacific Grove, California. Just moments from the beach, we are centrally located between Monterey and Pebble Beach. Within a mile is Cannery Row and the famous Monterey Bay Aquarium, as well as many choices for fine dining, shopping, and other family experiences. We have a variety of one and two bed rooms, many with ocean views. A perfect place for a getaway for the entire family!
